title: Is Shen really a ninja?
body:
He looks like one, he sounds like one....... But witnessing his gameplay he is doesn`t act like one. More like a rugby player tbh. Don`t get me wrong, I already know riot mentioned that he is considered as a beefy ninja but still, they should have made him a bit more convincing that he is a ninja since there is nothing worth mentioning on his kit that is ninjalike( Ninjalike = Shuriken, Clone jutsus that turns into wood logs, Mimics walls for stealth,  etc). Even his quotes doesn`t make sense with how he functions.( "You are already dead, you just havent caught up yet")......this quote would suit more to zed because of his ult if you ask me. I want to immerse as one if i want to play one..... but man its more like im playing football with this champ instead. Image ruined.

Oh and just to let you guys know, I am aware that there are most of you who likes the current Shen and I respect that. This is just me sharing my honest opinions of how could a ninja be like since I am into those kinds of stuff. If there is something in my text that you might found offensive or not exactly correct then i truly apologize for that. And with all that, have a nice day.

Traditionally, ninjas were mostly samurai on certain missions. They do fight in the open, protect their masters. And even have records in history. The "sneaky secret ops" thing rarely happened.

Actually Shen is somehow accurate to a real ninja more than zed.

I am Japanese don't try to lecture me. Bushido was a code of honor made up after the warring ages when the Tokugawa shogunate took over. And was much more talked about in the Meiji era after the samurai class was disbanded. As a moral guidance for finesse.
Samurai's hired mercenaries from other clans. All your other statements of stealth missions with hooded men are fantasy. And there is no such thing as "Ninja temples". Those are fortified monasteries for warrior monks during the age of religious strife where they nearly had the same political power as samurais.

This is the most famous "Ninja". Hattri Hanzo.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hattori_Hanz%C5%8D

He is clearly stated as a samurai warrior that fought with the shogun with many occasions out in the open as bodyguard. You know nothing of my country.

Idk. I would kind of argue that Shen is a more practical ninja than Zed or Akali. He actually wears a dark blue outfit, which helps him camoflauge the best at night, instead of the shiny and flashy outfits, and his kit is about providing distractions to the enemy (taunts and AA blocks) to enable a sure kill for his team.

Ninjas were also religious which means Shens spirit sword is a physical interpretation of that concept since it empowers his sword and protects him. His ultimate might be the most naruto-y ability as he channels a short period, presumably using a ninjutsu of some sort, to instantly travel to a location. Since he is Ionian instead of Asian it is logical to assume they would develope different ways and shapes to forge a blade. This is possible because they and the societies in Runeterra may hace developed differently from us on Earth, though therere many similarities. Perhaps it is the Ionians that created scimitar like weapons since there is no mention of any civilization that resembles the middle east (I am excluding skins such as sultan gangplank or tryndamere since skins exist in a reality of their own, I am mainly focusing on the reality that “default” skins reside in as that is what,the game mainly takes place in).

Mhmm I agree with this statement. Shen is a great ninja based in the Runeterra universe. @Terumie you should read the lore and understand that Shen was made with a blade in hand. Also previous shen did throw knives!

Ninja were mercenaries in Feudal Japan during the Edo Period. They usually wore disguises, such as merchant, ronin, priests, entertainers, and monk outfits. Appearance wise, Shen looks like a ninja. Ninja use guerilla tactics. Shen does not use guerilla tactics: That's Zed's job. Shen is not used for espionage, assassination, or infiltration. Shen is more of a Samurai than a ninja, at least in technique.
Shen USED to be far more ninja-like until his rework.
Shen is a witcher now according to his new lore.
That's like stealth in Hitman, you just punch everything. No one can see you if no one is there to see you {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
